name: MEGALAZER
description:
Pirates from planet Respore have been terrorizing human colonies across the galaxy using a new weapon called the MEGALAZER. We have found their mothership, which holds the only MEGALAZER in their entire fleet. Its up to you to destroy their defenses, disable their MEGALAZER, and wipe out the threat for good!

MEGALAZER is a bullet-hell top-down-shooter game made for MidWeek Bullet Jam 2018.
